articles.author: Eryn Mathewson and Zoë Saunders, CNN
articles.title: Why Rep. James Clyburn is pushing to make 'Lift Every Voice and Sing' the US national hymn
articles.description: This year, Rep. James Clyburn (D-SC) is bringing some extra attention to "Lift Every Voice and Sing" and sponsoring a bill that would make it the US national hymn.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Grape-Nuts will be back on shelves in March
articles.description: The Grape-Nuts shortage that ground an already on-edge nation to a halt has been resolved.

articles.author: Ray Sanchez, CNN
articles.title: Study finds police officers of color make fewer stops and arrests and use less force than white officers
articles.description: A study published Thursday in the journal Science finds that deploying officers of color as well as female officers could reduce instances of shootings and reported misconduct.

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Neanderthal genes can change clusters of human brain tissue, scientists find
articles.description: Scientists from the University of California San Diego have inserted Neanderthal DNA into clusters of human brain tissue. Their work could shed light on how our brains evolved and how they differ from those of ancient human ancestors.
articles.content:
(CNN)Brains are not preserved in the fossil record, making it impossible to know how modern human brains differ from our long-extinct ancestors, the Neanderthals.

articles.author: Priscilla Alvarez, Geneva Sands and Maria Santana, CNN
articles.title: Biden prepares rollback of controversial Trump-era policy on migrants at southern border
articles.description: The Biden administration is preparing plans for the gradual entry of migrants forced to remain in Mexico under a controversial Trump-era policy, according to three Homeland Security officials.

articles.author: Chloe Melas, CNN
articles.title: Morgan Wallen releases an apology video for his use of a racial slur
articles.description: Country star Morgan Wallen is speaking out again amid the controversy over his use of a racial slur that was caught on video.

articles.title: BBC News banned in China, one week after CGTN's license withdrawn in UK
articles.description: In an apparent tit for tat move, BBC World News has been banned from airing in China, according to a statement from China's National Radio and Television Administration (NRTA) on Thursday.

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: With Biden going big, Wall Street economists are growing bullish on the US economy
articles.description: The Covid-ravaged American economy was on the verge of slipping into a double-dip recession at the end of 2020. The pandemic was intensifying, gridlock paralyzed Washington and millions of families were about to lose crucial benefits.

articles.author: Sara Spary and Ada Wood, CNN
articles.title: Pigs can be taught how to use joysticks, experiment finds
articles.description: The intelligence of pigs has long been renowned -- and scientists in the US have now found that they are clever enough to be able to use computer joysticks.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: How Joe Biden's Cabinet picks are making history
articles.description: Being nominated to serve in a presidential Cabinet is, obviously, a huge honor. It's also been decidedly perilous in recent years.
articles.content:

articles.title: WHO Africa encourages the use of AstraZeneca vaccine despite variants
articles.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) African region has backed the use of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine against Covid-19 even in countries reporting variants of the disease.

articles.title: McCarthy defends attending his son's wedding amid peak of pandemic in December
articles.description: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy is defending his decision to attend his son's wedding in California in early December amid the resurgence of Covid-19 cases in the state, writing in a Facebook post he didn't regret the decision.

articles.title: How to stop your cat from killing so much wildlife
articles.description: Cat owners who want to stop their pets from hunting wildlife as much should play with them and feed them more meat, according to a new study.
